name: MLImageConstraint
desc: The width, height, and pixel format constraints of an image feature.

items.name: var pixelsWide: Int
items.desc: The model's default width for an image feature.

items.name: var pixelsHigh: Int
items.desc: The model's default height for an image feature.

items.name: var pixelFormatType: OSType
items.desc: The model's pixel format for an image feature.

items.name: var sizeConstraint: MLImageSizeConstraint
items.desc: Additional sizes this image feature supports.

items.name: class MLImageSizeConstraint
items.desc: A list or range of sizes that augment an image constraint's default size.
